text: Piper seychellarum (also called Seychelles Pepper) is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is endemic to Seychelles. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Gerlach, J. 2003. Piper seychellarum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
